actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, USDA, ITC, USTR.

official_title: To reduce temporarily the duty on certain food coloring solutions.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 1994, the duty on food coloring solutions containing cochineal carmine lake and paprika oleoresin, but not including any synthetic organic coloring matter.

titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on certain food coloring solutions.
